targets.expression:
fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and metadata.countryCode in [${countryCode:singlequote}]
|stats sum(event_details.cachestatus="MISS") as cachemiss,sum(event_details.cachestatus="HIT") as cachehit,cachehit/(cachemiss+cachehit) as chr by cdn,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display  event_timestamp,cdn,chr

fields concat(event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type="cdn_metrics"
|stats sum(event_details.cachestatus="MISS") as cachemiss,sum(event_details.cachestatus="HIT") as cachehit,cachehit/(cachemiss+cachehit) as Global by cdn,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display  event_timestamp,Global,'-',cdn

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and metadata.countryCode in [${countryCode:singlequote}]
|stats avg(event_details.compRate) as compression by metadata.countryCode,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,metadata.countryCode,compression

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type="cdn_metrics" 
|stats avg(event_details.compRate) as overall by 'overall',bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,overall

filter event_type="com.amazon.rum.performance_navigation_event" and metadata.countryCode in [${countryCode:singlequote}]
|stats count(*) as pageviews by metadata.deviceType as device 
|display device,pageviews

filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and event_details.type="navigation" and metadata.countryCode in [${countryCode:singlequote}]
|stats count(*) as ${countryCode} by event_details.cdn,bin(5m)

filter event_type="com.amazon.rum.performance_navigation_event" 
|stats count(*) as Global by 'overall',bin(5m)

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and event_details.type="navigation" and metadata.countryCode in [${countryCode:singlequote}]
|stats sum(event_details.cachestatus="MISS") as cachemiss,sum(event_details.cachestatus="HIT") as cachehit,cachehit/(cachemiss+cachehit) as chr by cdn,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display  event_timestamp,cdn,chr

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and event_details.type="navigation" and metadata.countryCode in [${countryCode:singlequote}]
|stats avg(event_details.compRate) as compression by cdn,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,cdn,compression

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and event_details.type="navigation" and metadata.countryCode in [${countryCode:singlequote}]
| stats pct(event_details.tlstime,${percentile}) as tlstime by cdn,bin(1m) as event_timestamp
| display event_timestamp,cdn,tlstime

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and event_details.type="navigation" and metadata.countryCode in [${countryCode:singlequote}]
| stats pct(event_details.pageload,${percentile}) as pageload by cdn,bin(1m) as event_timestamp
| display event_timestamp, cdn, pageload

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type="cdn_metrics" and event_details.type="navigation" and metadata.countryCode in [${countryCode:singlequote}]
| stats pct(event_details.ttfb,${percentile}) as ttfb by cdn,bin(1m) as event_timestamp
| display event_timestamp, cdn, ttfb

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn

| display event_timestamp, cdn, ttlb
